EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmed: Honeywell Operators Conference
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Your registration has been confirmed for the Honeywell Operators Conference in Johannesburg.
Event: Honeywell Operators Conference Date: March 19th, 2019 Location: Southern Sun Montecasino, Montecasino Blvd, Fourways, Johannesburg
Please contact us at Mohammad.Abdo@honeywell.com <[[mailto:Mohammad.Abdo@honeywell.com?subject=Honeywell Operators Conference | Johannesburg]]> with any questions.
We look forward to meeting you during our event!
Sincerely,
Honeywell Aerospace Events Team
